name: Terminal Hacker (itch) (StarsNoMoon)
description:
This game represents the start of my game dev journey; it was the first game I ever made. It's more a showcase of what I've learned in the sphere of game development.

It is a small, short game and in it you play as an average human using what limited hacking skills they have in order to hack into 3 terminals, so that they may make their life easier.
